case.state: Strip poker? Well, this is just one alternate universe, so why not?
Hey, what's up? Huh? Strip poker, that's what's up?
Huh. A strip poker joint. Definitely not what I was expecting.
Hi. A friend told me that there's a swingers club here? Oh, wait, strip poker? Err...sure, I guess I can work with that. (Dammit, MJ!)
Yo-yo! Mind if I drop in?
Hi. I've heard this is where all the cool people hang out.
Hello there! Mind if I hang here for a bit? Sorry, couldn't resist.
Welcome, true believers and newcomers alike!
Paris? J'adore Paris!
I don't think the moon in the sky is the only moon we're gonna see tonight.
*sigh* Well when in Rome...or Paris in this case.
Do you think people can see us from up here? (Hopefully not. I don't want to lose both my identity and my dignity)
Do they speak French in the Paris in this universe? If so, I really wish I paid attention in French class.
*sigh* I can't believe I'm in Paris and I'm doing this of all things...
Strip poker in Paris... Can't say I've ever had that in my travel plans.
You'd think the travel agent would mention strip poker in the brochure.
(The hot spring looks rather inviting. Depending how this game goes I may have to hop in)
A steamy environment for a steamy game. How fitting...
Look at all the hearts everywhere! And we're playing a card game. There's a joke to be made here...
Given it's close to Valentine's Day, seems fitting we have this here.
Believe it or not, a universe where there's a bajillion hearts everywhere isn't the craziest universe I've gone to.
Wow, look at all these ladies and gentlemen. This is a weird crossover world, but hey, let's have some fun.
So are you all from different universes too? Or is this a Comic Con after hours sort of deal? Whatever the reason, I'm so not losing!
*sigh* Well when in Rome...
I'm sooo gonna regret this. (And I'm sooo gonna get back at MJ for lying to me about this place).
Alright, sure. I'll stay and play. What's the worst that could happen? (A lot of things, I'm sure).
Well, a-alright. I guess I was planning on doing something like this eventually.
Well, I'm sure that Spider-Woman can handle a game of cards. (And the old Spidey-Sense will come in handy I'm sure. That's not cheating, right?)
Screw it. I'll swap everything.
Five. And yes, I need them.
Ugh. Got nothing. Five new cards please, dealer.
None for me thanks. Don't need 'em.
Nah, I'm not switching any this time.
Nope! Don't need to switch anything. Thanks anyway though.
Psh! Why would I swap out any of these?
What?! WHAT!? No way!
You're kidding!
~cards~ for me, dealer.
Alright then, ~cards~ please.
Hmm...~cards~ would be the obvious move...
~cards~ should be what I need.
Let's go with ~cards~. Thanks.
Okay, ~cards~ is good a decision as any.
I'll snag ~cards~.
So, you know Earth-~cards~, right? That's the number I want.
~cards~.
~cards~ please.
~cards~ thanks.
Okay, so if I take away...~cards~ thank you.
Ditch those and, yeah, ~cards~ for me.
~cards~.
Lemme just snag ~cards~.
I'm thinking ~cards~.
Let's make it ~cards~.
I spy-der ~cards~ I don't need over here.
~cards~.
A smart spider would go for ~cards~. So, I'll do that!
~cards~.
Yeesh. Gonna need ~cards~ to fix this.
How about ~cards~?
~cards~ me, Amadeus!
Yeesh. Gonna need ~cards~ to fix this.
Gwanda need ~cards~ cards over here, haha! (Oh, wait, that one doesn't work...)
Gwen are my cards arriving?
~cards~.
Hopefully ~cards~ will do the trick.
Hmm...I'm hoping ~cards~ should do the trick.
~cards~, peas and carrots.
~cards~, please and thank you.
Umm...alright, ~cards~.
~cards~
Okay, I can do this with ~cards~, I hope.
(~cards~ will be enough, right?) Yes, ~cards~ please.
I'll take ~cards~.
Wanna guess? Ha, kidding. ~cards~ please.
Yeah, gonna go with ~cards~ this round.
The smart thing to do...would be to go for ~cards~.
Yikes. ~cards~.
~cards~, now! Err, please, sorry.
I need ~cards~, r-right now!
~cards~, I need ~cards~ over this way.
Err...hmm...okay, ~cards~.
~cards~.
~cards~!
~cards~...hope this works...
5...no wait, ~cards~! (Please don't let me down, Spider-Sense...)
I don't think I need any...nowait! Idefinitelyneed ~cards~!
A Spider-Woman in need needs ~cards~ this round.
Umm...err...okay, I'll go with ~cards~.
I...I...need ~cards~?
I think I need ~cards~...yeah okay, ~cards~.
~cards~.
...A tentative ~cards~?
~cards~. Come on, don't let me down...
Hmm...see if I can dodge this here bullet.
I have a fondness for other bug heroes with a smidgen of nervousness. Y'know. Like some people here.
This's a good hand...and yeah, sorta? Sam's a lot more... forward than you are. Years of fighting in Nazi controlled time-lines do that, I suppose.
Hey, Ladybug, you ever visit NYC?
Yo, LB, ever visit NYC? It's nice when it's not being threatened by villains. And when it is, well, it'd benefit from a visit by you I'm sure.
Hey, Marinette, you ever visit NYC?
Yo, LB, ever visit NYC? It's nice when it's not being threatened by villains. And when it is, well, it'd benefit from a visit by you I'm sure.
Okay, okay. I'll wait for you to lose for real, Mari.
Morrigan! Control your bats! (Least she's not as bad as Morbius. Or Koala Kommander!)
Whoa, this's a crazy alternate dimension. My Cap's a woman!
Ugh this is going to sound sooo cliche. But obviously I'm a fan of old-school rap and punk rock. Aaand anything with some good drumming it, I can definitely enjoy that.
I’m certainly not opposed to you speaking to me in French, Marinette. (I could listen to her read the dictionary! The French one at least).
Okay, gotta say, I really love it whenever you're speaking French. (Wonder if me and the MJ's could get her to record some lines!)

Uh, you know, if you’re like me, I think a girl needs to bring her own protection to protect herself sometimes. Plus, doesn’t it feel slimy and kinda gross? Can’t say I’m into it, given that I work with slimy, sticky stuff all day.
I'm not always the most...forward person in relationships. It's hard, y'know? When you do what I do, you often don't want to get too close to people.
This will sound so cliche but…I like hot dogs from the Dollar Dog. Nothin’ needs to be fancy for it to be good!
I’m not too picky. Would prefer to order something after the game, though. Put it on me if I lose! (Oh, shoot. I'm not carrying money. Hmm...shouldn't be hard to beat someone who's drunk, right?)
I’m not too picky. Just serve me something with a pickleback, I guess? That's a fun way to start a party.
So Sei's into butt stuff? Well… I’ve...huh, well, good to know I guess?
Woah, hol' up. That might be tmi right there. That or I'm not drunk enough to talk about that kinda thing yet.
I'm not actually that unique… the other Gwens aren't me by a long shot, though. Or the usual Gwen Stacys. But I am my own person. I can always say that.
Huh, sure, April, I could do an interview. Usually I don't get a chance to say my side.
Why, hello. Hmm…where are you from, blue-haired, blue-eyed, and gorgeous? (Oh jeez, why on Earth did I open with a line like that?)
Do you know what would go great with this hand? Some wine. I'm thinking a nice Bordeaux...
Do you know what would go great with this hand? Some cheese. I'm thinking a nice brie with a toasted baguette...
Do you know what would go great with this hand? Some crêpes. I like mine with strawberries...
Hot damn I can't believe it! Ha! Just wait until you see this hand!
Oh my God! This is like one in a million right here!
Wow...am I in a universe where this is more common, or have I actually just gotten this lucky?
It's over, ~player~! I have the high ground! Er - I mean a great hand.
Sooo is this what's done in this universe for fun? Or are we all just doing some sorta ancient ritual?
This hand has a better lineup than the Yankees! (Even gives my fantasy baseball team a run for it's money.)
You know what? I gotta good feeling about this round.
Getting no bad vibes from this hand.
Sweet! Exactly what I wanted.
Hmm...normally my luck isn't this good. Not complaining mind you.
Good. Real good!
Alright, gotta keep these good hands like the good times rolling!
(Hmm. I've definitely had worse than these).
(I'll certainly take this hand).
What? Are you so desperate a pretty face is all you need to lose your nerve, ~player~?
You know, some of you suggested making really good hands worth two. How about now?
I'm no formal detective, but something tells me I'm winning this hand.
Shame I couldn't have gotten more hands like this before I lost my mask.
Ooh! This hand's pretty fire.
This hand's got a good bass line to it. You know, like anything of quality.
(Good! Should be avoiding another loss with this one).
(Yes! A hand I can be confident in).
(This is a hand I can hold with confidence).
(Look's like I'm not going to lose anything this round).
Well well well. Guess who's not stripping this time?
Sooo, yeah. looks like I'm not the only blonde here tonight. Let's see what they say if we have more fun or what, 'kay?
Let's both of us try to buck that old, bs stereotype, huh ~name~?
Heh, we got a bluenette here tonight, eh? What a weird word.
The word for blue-haired people is bluenettes, you know that, right?
(Whoa. I'd say I've never seen hair like whatername's over there, but between villains and punk-rockers, I've seen some pretty crazy hair. Still impressive though).
Whoa, gonna comment on the exotic hairdos hair tonight. Get it? Hair today, gone tomorrow? Yeah, yeah...eeeh that one kinda blew, sorry.
(I've got to admit, I think MJ would be a total riot in a game like this! And she'd totally take it all in her stride, being fearless as she is).
(Can't help but being reminded of MJ, seeing another red-head. But it'd be dumb to assume anything about their personality for it. It sucks being generalized like that).
Gotta admit, and whilst this isn't your fault, ~name~, green isn't exactly my favorite color. I've...I've got my reasons.
(I'm so bad for thinking this, but I wonder if the carpet matches the drapes? The thought of a green "bush" is just plain funny).
(I wonder if they're actually blonde and took a swim in the pool before coming here...)
Pink hair? Well, you've got me tickled. *Badum-tss*
Pink hair? Definitely seen my share of that. Hey, you'd be surprised how many punk rock types wear pink, even in their hair. Pink is, like, a double level of rebellion in the scene!
Hey, Deep Purple, how're your cards? Heh, I wonder how many people even know about that band these days.
Ain't there a song about purple-haired whatshername? Eh, tbh there's lots of songs that bring up the color purple at some point.
Eyy, purple! A classic color in the punk and glam rock scenes! What's not to love about it?
Ooh, gotta love the ghostly white hair. Funny, I'm actually known as the Ghost-Spider some places 'cause of my costume.
(Gotta say, I always liked Felicia's white hair. I can say what I like but that cat has some style!)
What, I'm a fan of the color white? What on Earth gave that away?!
(With a hand like this, I'm still in with a chance!)
This works. It doesn't work cleanly, but this fight's been anything if not dirty.
(Good save, Spidey-Sense! Good save!)
*Phew* I can relax for one round at least. Hopefully!
(I should be able to evade danger this round).
There's a gallows-style joke that I'm dead in every universe except the one I'm currently in. Point is: I'm still in this game! (That's still so damn weird to me).
Woo! Good hand! Alright!
Looks like my instincts were right on the money this round. (Might just have been my Spidey-Sense though. No rules about that in poker).
(Good! Just what I needed right now).
I tend to have a soft spot for other bug heroes with a smidgen of nervousness. Y'know. You kinda remind me of me. In a lot of ways, actually.
This's a good hand... and yeah, sorta! Sam's a lot more... forward. Years of fighting in Nazi dimensions'll do that, I suppose.
Haha! Wow! Those are some flaming hot undies, D.Va. Very pin-up.
Miraculous Ladybug? Like, Amazing Spider-Woman? Hmm...what if I call you MLB? Yeah, MLB. That sounds cool whenever it's said out loud.
The Miraculous Ladybug is quite a mouthful, huh? Say, what if I call you by a nickname? I'm Spidey. You could be...MLB? (Huh. That actually sounds pretty cool).
Okay, okay. I'll wait for you to lose for real, Mari.
(Whoa, this's a crazy alternate dimension. My Cap's a woman!)
Wait, huh? Oh. Captain America's a dude in this universe. (More of a MAN than a dude, though. Dude doesn't seem like it fits right).
I'm really sorry! Didn't mean any offense by the blonde chicks and bodysuits comment. You look lovely too, D.Va.
Err, sorry. No offense about the blonde chicks and bodysuits, you look lovely too, Marinette.
Sorry, sorry! No offense about that dumb blonde chicks and bodysuits thing! You look lovely too, Meia.
You’re fine by me, Futaba. So long as you're not just doing things for the thrill of it. (Stunts like that can have real big consequences).
So long as you're not just hacking and other stuff like that because you can. I've known people like that, it doesn't ever go well in the long run.
I doubt this is much of a surprise, but I'm a real fan of old-school rap and rock. Lotta those OG guys were from the Bronx, so that stuff speaks to me.
You know, it’s a bit weird to be idolized...like, real weird. But hey, at the same time, I appreciate it! It's nice to have supporters.
Man, Seven and Futaba, do you two not get out much or what? If this is your idea of that? Well, that's super brave of you!
Oh yeah, the MLB is also about baseball. But you’re the one hitting it out of the park, Lady B!
Oh my God, Marinette, you are adorkable. Search your feelings, you know them to be true!
“Heronet?” That’s a thing? Where do I sign up, Marinette?”
Aww, Marinette, don't do me like that! I’m a modern, American hero too, you know!
I...I don’t know if I’m that adventurous, Marinette...heh, but I’m sure I could show you a Miraculous time! (Wait, was that too cringey?)
Wait, hol' up. Your suit is magic underwear, Marinette?
I mean, most contagious things are from like, close physical contact. Like a spider bite. Or… You know… Marinette, are you blushing?
Oh uh, of course I meant Marinette!
You know, if you being awkward is contagious, Marinette, I got a raw deal.
Meia and Mei. A Mei of Meias! Oh, s-sorry, your names are fun to say is all!
Meia? Mia? Mee-uh? M-eye-uh? Names are hard, folks.
Remind me how you guys pronounce your names exactly, again?
Hey, so if I pronounce one of you guy's names wrong at some point, sorry in advance.
It's, uh...complicated. Like, I don't want to be a loner, but, doing what I do? Knowing how that can go for people who trust me? Makes it real hard to do friends. Or relationships.
This will sound so cliche but…I like hot dogs from the Dollar Dog. Nothin’ fancy and not tryin’ to be.
Oh! Well, thanks! I’m not too picky. So long as it isn't Ouzo then I should be good!
I’m not too picky. Oh, so long as it goes with a side of lime I should be alright.
Whoa, Seven, what's the stuff around your eye? Is it jewelry? Something high tech?
*Pffft!* Front page smears. Okay, that was a good one.
So Sei's into butt stuff? Well… I’ve never met a guy who wasn’t happy I was okay with it, even if I’m not enthusiastic about it.
I'm not actually that unique… the other Gwens aren't me by a long shot, though. Or the usual Gwen Stacys.
Whoa, I like the accent. You from Brooklyn, Aimee? I’m a Queens girl, myself.
You look like a girl who knows her way around a pie. A pizza pie, at least, April.
Ladybug? Whaaat? I knew Paris had some superheroes, but I never expected one here. Let’s totally team up, and kick some butt! Either side of the pond would do.
Seven, you seem a bit...you okay? (She sounds kinda monotone. Hope she's feeling alright. Or...that she isn't a Skrull in disguise or something like that).
Hey, Seven. I could never rock a cut like that, Orrr at least I didn't think that. Kind of an accident but my style's actually kinda similar to yours.
Whew! (Seven's suit sure does show off! I mean, dayum! That's a tight uniform! That makes my costume look easy to wear).
Jeez. I'm just staring at that uniform. That thing must damn near strangle the life out of you.
A blog, Marinette? That’s much nicer than front-page smears on the Daily Bugle, methinks.
Am I the only one more comfortable in her suit than out of it? Like, seriously, it's like getting a day-long hug.
Personally speaking I find costumes like mine real comfortable. I wouldn't do street patrols in this if I didn't feel comfortable!
What's it with blonde chicks and bodysuits?
Trust me, ladies and gentlemen, you're really not going to be all that interested with what I'm working with. I'm just normal looking...
I'll hit! Wait, wrong game. Sorry folks!
Not bad, not bad.
I've done more with less.
Drum roll please...!
Let's see who's next!
Not gonna lie, this one's kinda shrug-worthy.
Any particular reason why we aren't using chairs? Or tables? Pretty weird setup for a card game. Feels like playing a drum kit without a stool.
This hand's like a 4/4 beat in a song. It's alright, but kinda basic.
Uh-huh.
Yuh-huh.
Coolio.
Cool.
Hmm...oh, okay.
I can work with this.
Should I bluff? Not sure if I need to bluff.
Argh! This uncertainty is killing me.
Putting my hopes on these.
Aww, man. I wish I'd brought a band T-shirt or two along. Would've been happy to hand some out.
(Crap. I was thinking about something else. This hand's...commensurate with that).
Meh.
There's no like, draft passing, right?
(This hand's of...ambiguous quality).
Ugh. (Not garbage, but not great either).
(I might be the Amazing Spider-Woman, but this is decidedly not an amazing hand).
This is...eh, it's okay by me.
Blah. (This hand's blah with a side of blah supreme).
(Hmm...not so good that I could avoid losing with this. And knowing a Spider's luck...)
Hmm...yeah, 's alright.
Anyone want to trade cards? Is that a rule in this universe? Please tell me that's a rule.
(Y'know, there's a weird, never-made-it-to-a-frat-party side of me that's a little excited standing here like this).
Really cutting it close here!
Oh come on! Cut a part-time bodega clerk a break!
Folks, the girls are out. Any chance you'll... No? Ugh, fine.
I need some more cards! Wait, that's it? I don't know mulligan now, do I? No?
(Oof. If that was as good as my Spidey-Sense could do, I'd hate to have seen my hand without it).
(I'm looking for better than this...)
...Well, could still be worse.
(Man, really? That's all I've got?)
(This mediocre hand goes out to all the dudes who play acoustic guitars at parties).
Sheesh. Mediocre hand.
I tend to have a thing for other bug heroes with a smidgen of nervousness. Heh, no way that sounds familiar, right?
...Anyone else getting the willies from ~name~ or just me? No offense, kid. You're just giving me an odd vibe.
This's a good hand... and yeah, sorta! Sam's a lot more... forward. Years of fighting in Nazi dimensions'll do that, I suppose.
Okay, okay. I'll wait for you to lose for real, Mari.
Whoa, this's kinda crazy. My Cap's a woman! (I'm familiar with my alt universe Spider-people. But not my alt universe Captain Americas).
Ugh this is going to sound so cliche. But obviously I'm a fan of old-school rap and punk rock. (%$#@ the establishment! But not really).
I'd, uhh, that kinda stuff's a bit too personal to talk about. Can we not, please?
I like hot dogs from the Dollar Dog...hey, don't look at me like that, street food stuff is awesome!
I’m not too picky. Oh, just serve it with a pickle back, though. Uh, after I lose my mask. Which I'm aiming not to.
I’m not too picky. Oh, just serve it with a pickle back, though.
So Sei's into butt stuff? Well… I’ve never met a guy who wasn’t happy I was okay with it, even if I’m not enthusiastic about it.
I'm not actually that unique… the other Gwens aren't me by a long shot, though.
*sigh* Well, at least there's this view.
Hmm. At least the city's lovely right now.
To be clear, there's no house rules that make 2's wild, right?
Ah...this hand is trash-fire. And believe me, I know my trash-firess from my trash-fireses.
My Spider-Sense is tingling...and not in a good way. (Not like there ever was a good way).
Oh. That's not good.
A hit and a miss. That's this hand.
Well, this hand sucks.
(Oh, I've got a bad hand. Just my luck).
Aww, not what I wanted.
Whoops. That was a mistake.
Darn it.
YES! Wait. No. Never mind. #$@%
Huh. Really? Now?
Look guys, I already showed you my face. That's already worth a lot, don't you think?
(Aww crap. Really?)
*sigh* that's gonna put some dirt in my eye.
Ouch. Feels like someone cut my web-line mid swing.
YEEEAAAhhhhaaaaa...ah...I've made a mistake.
Great, cards that're like a rock group without drums.
Oof. This hand's one drum short of a kit.
Hm, I was going to web a few more cards, but I guess I'll stick with this. No? Not funny?
(Darn it. Not what I wanted).
(Well damn. Only thing that's getting schooled right now is me).
Would be a bummer if something decided to crash into here and interrupt the game. Yep. A reeaaal bummer...
(You're trash, cards).
Sun's out, guns out...uhh. Well, not really. (And I've not got a great hand neither).
My spider-sense doesn't seem super reliable here...
Tell you what. You let me win this hand, I'll take one for you later. I still need to psych myself up.
No...
*sigh* (And here's one Gwen Stacy who thought she was gonna make it...)
(Oh come on, Spider-Sense! You're supposed to do better than this!)
(Welp! I'm in need of a rescue here).
My damsel in distress level is rising by the second.
(Bullet not dodged! Bullet not dodged!)
Well, this makes me want to jump off of the Brooklyn Bridge. Well, almost.
(Face it, tiger. This is all you've got).
Crap.
(That's gotta be the best behind I've ever seen!)
Holy moly, guacamole. (I know it's rude to stare, but dayum!)
(I think my whole apartment's smaller than her bottom is).
(She could put someone under arrest with that thing. Cardiac arrest at the very least).
Astounding...hand! G-got an astounding hand over here. My cards definitely aren't, err, ass. T-that's for sure.
(That's the People's Republic of China's ass right there).
(Boy. If ever there was a contender for the national ass of China, it'd be Chun-Li's).
Joey, I gotta say, been thinking about your whole uh, state of affairs downstairs. The shaved look’s gotta be so it’s easy to put whip cream or other Burlesque gags, right?
Man, having prehensile webs seems a lot more useful. But where’d you summon all those vines from?
Hey, random question, but do you know Batman?
I love this song!
You know, I'm quite the drummer. Maybe we could have a little jam session after this.
I'm in a band called the Mary Janes. You should hear some of our music, Amy. It's a similar style.
Oh that reminds me. I'm going to miss band practice yet again...
I wish this place had a drum kit. We could get someone on guitar and find a bassist to have ourselves a little cover band.
Man, you know how to brighten up the situation!
Always looking on the bright side of things, aren't you Lux?
Be careful. If you lose, we may see a flash!
What's that? A little glimmer in your eye? Okay, it's a bit of an off-day for me in the pun department.
Well aren't you making light of the situation.
Oh so you're a pun-master too? I've been told I'm sick with the burns and bad with the puns, but that doesn't stop me!
Okay that one was bad even for my standards.
There's nothing wrong with a little light banter!
Blinded by the light! Revved up like a deuce, another runner in the night!
Not gonna lie, I wouldn't mind being flashed.
You've just brightened my day!

I mean...I've taken more big hits than I can count, but thanks to my powers I can shrug off harm better than most. Never had an injury that's left a scar on me so far. And boy have I had some serious ones.

I've, uhh, never had to worry about it, I'm afraid to say. I heal a lot better than most, thanks to the way I am. But if you want me to talk about all the dangerous situations I've been in then I can talk for hours.
You'd expect me to be covered in scars after everything I've been through. But I've not picked up any permanent marks so far in my career. I can thank advanced healing for that.
(Dammit. I know my knife-markings. This...this isn't something someone's done to her. Ayano's made those marks herself).
(Should I say something? I know those knife-marks are self-inflicted. I should...I should talk to her privately after the game, see if I can help).
(Okay. Okay, Ayano's been cutting herself. A lot of her behavior makes more sense now. Poor girl, she needs help. I see what I can do for her after this is over).
Good for you, Mercy! I know it's hard to not get competitive. Or, just to get worked up over the whole stripping deal.
Yeah, good to keep in mind that this is supposed to be a game and supposed to be fun.
Hey, no problem, Angela. But no need to apologize, we're all friends here, after all.
I don't live here, sweetie. I'm from New York city. That's where you'll find my resident neighborhood.
Nope! Just visiting. I'm not from around here, I'm from New York.
No, sorry. I'm representing my home town of New York, May.
Wha? I don't wear a mask to cause trouble. Honest. I actively do my best to put an end to trouble.
N-no! Honest. I'm, like, anti-trouble, Mia. I wear a mask to fight crime and help people in whichever ways I can.
Oh. Well, I don't mean to sound like I'm bragging, but my own are pretty great. If I was to have one more though, I think flying would be sweet!

I mean, I have quite a few already so it's hard to think of what else I'd have. But I'd love to be super smart. I mean, I do my best and keep learning new skills, but imagine how cool being a super genius would be
Hmm...I wouldn't mind the power to turn invisible. I have a friend who can do that. That trick comes in real useful sometimes.
I...umm...God, I'm so sorry to hear that, Mia. I...know how it feels to lose family. (Though, being walked out on is very different to what happened to Dad).
I know how it feels to lose someone suddenly, Mia. But that...even if that kind of experience is different to the way I've lost people.
I...huh? Well, I guess the best kind of mercs are the ones that haven't been hired to shoot me dead. I've cetainly met enough of those.
Hmm...mercs who are great...I'm a big fan of the ones who haven't tried to shoot me. Ahh...I have a lotta not-so-fond experiences of private military types.
Heh. Funny question. Maybe in another life I would've been a merc myself. Crazy thought, right?
Oh! You could go with the, uuh...hmm...hol' up..Leonie the cool kinda....s-sorry, names can be hard.
Hah. Sorry, Leonie. You're asking the wrong Spider-Woman. I'm...not exactly all that original when it comes to names.
Well, I mean, no matter how I've felt about someone, I've always tried to keep people at a distance. My line of work doesn't make it safe for people to get close.
*sigh* Yeah. I know how it feels. And that's why I've got to keep a distance from people. Having a boyfriend isn't the best idea.
Yeah. Loved. Lost. The whole nine yards, once or twice. But in the end, it's just me. And it's for the best that it stay that way.
I don’t have pets, no. But I do know a talking pig!
Well I've given my lunch/breakfast to the pigeons of New York more times than I can think of. They're almost like family at this point.
